Text: Should I take on the new client?
What reason should I give for not taking on the client?
Option1: They have a bad track record and doing business with them could mean dishonesty in our contract.
Option2: This new investigation shows that they can't be trusted to do the right thing.
Option3: Asociating with the client could lead to reputation harm to our company.

Option1: At any point we can stop the project if it appears the client is doing something unethical.
Option2: The client may not make any changes to the product we create after finishing it for them.
Option3: ITS4 will assume no liability for any harm caused by the product.

Text: What reason should I give for taking on the client?
Option1: Business is business and they are a huge client.
Option2: Their most recent charge is only aleged and isn't proven yet.
Option3: It is what our CEO wants.
